title: Closing Remarks

author: Maja Brenčič Makovec, Ministrstvo za izobraževanje, znanost in šport Republike Slovenije

segmentation: We warn European Championship, but we won another championship.
This was worldwide, so we are Congress, which was a bit of championship for all us.
And thank you for being a part of this game truly, sincerely, openly and with lots of efforts that we are all together on the right way.
Right way to fulfill the most important values of UNESCO.
Most important values for all of us.
This is iaccessible open inclusive education and all we are is something what we have to work on exactly for the purpose of the values for the whole world.
7 billion people around us do not have access to the knowledge.
Do not know what we are means and what actually is, but it's our duty.
And in a way honor that we are leading this way forward, and that we do as much as we can to bring this knowledge to everyone.
So thank you for coming to Ljubljana and thank you for understanding.
Why not only basketball championship, but knowledge, education and prosperity of Slovenia?
Would like to be a part of the World Development and thank you for recognizing that for coming to us.
It is of course at the end of the Congress that we speak about our achievements and it is about many, many people who have contributed to whatever we have done here and we have done lots.
So first of all Mr.
Tank, thank you for the support.
The rapporteurs.
Thank you for the whole overview of this 2 1/2 days.
Thank you.
Interject for keeping us move forwards and the Russia without Commonwealth of learning.
We definitely wouldn't be here at this level of achievements and their excellence is my colleagues, ministers, the exact secretaries, ladies and gentlemen.
It was truly my pleasure to be with you almost two days.
1/2 being present here, my colleagues at the ministry are asking me, will you stay in Sankarea Dome because we would still like to have you back, you know and I said yes.
Yes, I'm coming back with yes new Homeworks.
But at the same time with high motivation even higher than it was before.
Because I know that we aren't the right way all together.
So thank you for that and one applause to all of you.
This is how we started and there will be at the next Congress photo how we ended here, right WHI, because there will be.
A path in between which we have already put on our agenda and thank you to all colleague ministers that we have been very efficient in stating what we want to do on this path.
Definitely what is very very important is that joint statement shows.

Few lines of our commitments which I really believe in, and all of us should is that actions and course which are upon us are about the capacity of users to access, reuse, share, ovr about issues related to language and culture, about security of the content.
We have to talk more and more about it.
Equitable, inclusive access.
This is why we're here, aren't we?
And changing business models.
To support digital transformation, digital modernization, modernization of education and definitely being supporting with proper funding and legal frameworks.
Otherwise, we could hardly say that we will contribute to each of our systems.
But at the end contributes to all of us to the whole world and to the knowledge in which we believe so.
In all the discussions we really saw.
Not only.
New approaches to we have learned from each other all the time, but what we have managed and which I'm really proud of as a Minister of Education, science and sports is comprehensive.
Lubiana Ovr action plan.
I even missed the debate because I thought there will be lots of discussion about the action plan, but it was done so efficiently in few moments.
Practically that I would really like to thank for the support to a nesco and to Commonwealth and to all of you.
That we could be so successful in this way, we truly believe in this action planner Slovenia will do its best to be one of the providers, supporters and true actors of fulfilling the action plan.
Thank you.
I don't not only that, I think this action plan can be a great background also for UNESCO.
Recommendation on we are in which we all believe in thank you Mr Tank to mentioning that in your final sentence.
There is much more.
To be done and we all know that we usually have our homeworks from commitment to action.
We set from action to reality.
This is a reality now.
It started with the action plan and action plan.
Means fulfillment means delivery means efficiency, effectiveness, so huge homeworks.
And as professor, I like to give Homeworks and I'm sure that as ministers you give for home works.
So let us work on this homeworks.

We truly work on our leadership that we create inclusive environments that we are open for different opinions and thank you for this different opinions being set also through the Congress and that we are really willing to achieve positive outcomes.
Not only that, I know that every minister, every government, every institutions have to have the accountability, efficiency and effectiveness and show the results at the end.
So let's test and be measurable.
Also, in the achievements which we will put on the table, I think that's very important.
Also for the message for the whole community, for an ESCO stamped and also for the Commonwealth.
So not only that.
We have done some regional coalitions, regional initiatives and thank you to the Ministers from Croatia, Serbia, Macedonia.
All our neighboring countries that we could sit down and talk about what has been already done in this region and my initiative is now being so.

Supported by all these countries, we will call it opening up Southeast Europe, creating original wrote Man common standards and criteria for ovr we're working already on finding best practices in regional repositories of this and mobilize all the stakeholders.
We have already put the statement together.
It's going to be signed in next few days and I'm really looking forward that through the Congress we can also contribute regionally to the.
Goals we have set through the through the statements and of course also we are.
Standards we wanted to set here another.
Another very important message goes also to potential normative instruments on.
We are in EU and thank you to the Commissioner for being one of the first supporters to come to the Congress and thank you also to some of my ministers.
Colleagues like Minister from Malta.
We have talked through the Presidency lot about we are in different aspects and 10 Umm signed the support for the original UNESCO resolution.
And thank you for all that to the countries mentioned.
I think we will proceed and I hope that we will have the voice also to proceed with this with through the next presidencies of for the education.
Also at the EU level.
This is how the world can truly step together.
And.
Not only that, I think that.

You have tasted a bit of Slovenia and that there is of course still a belief that you can come again and that there is a wish to come again and therefore I'm already inviting you to our next international event which will take place in pier on.
I don't know if you heard about the pier and we call it little Venice.
It's really tempting.
Just near the seaside Slovenian seaside and there will be a special meeting on October 9 and 10 we will.
We also discussed potentials of or.
We are in facilitating intercultural dialogue and the area which will encompass this would be Euro Med attarian area.
We have a Mooney University here which is cross cultural humanitarian institution also being organized by Annalyn Foundation and of course our ministry and Ministry for Foreign Affairs.
So maybe this could be the first call to.
Have you back to Selenia welcome.
And definitely not last, and especially not least, I truly hope that you have enjoyed this thing here and there is always whatever we do in our lives.
Lots about trust in people and thank you to all of you to Nesco to all the cool organization teams to trust us, the Ministry our UNESCO team.
To provide this Congress and to show that we are true believers in Ovr Slovenia will go forward.
As I said, we have a strong commitment at the government level and as long as I'm in this shoes, I will definitely try to not only keep the pace but do what we can all contribute to each other.
And since there is nothing in this world happening without those who are not only high knee motivated but also believers in what they do.
I would now like to take the opportunity and thank to really, really special team with whom I worked, my team and your team.
So let me ask Zaynap to come to the stage.
Monica double.
Media.
Utah.
Dashboard.
Heat.
These are those without whom would?
We would not all be here in such a pleasant way and with such.
Good spirit of the Congress.
Thank you to all of you.
Thank you.
Trying to figure it out.
It goes and I know.
Yeah.
Really.
But there are special people you always remember when you work different tasks and not only commitments but those joyful areas where you really see that things are moving forward.
So the Russia I would really like to thank you for that.
And their indrajit.
Just little memories from.
Sevenia, but with the spirit of.
The idea that we can move the world forward, and I think this is something what we all believe in.
Thank you very much.
SV as we all usually say, we are one world and knowledge pertains to all humanity.
Let's be human.
This is something what values and gathers us all.
Thank you again.
